source: dfresult = spark.sql("Select distinct 3 as SourceID, A.ActorID,ActorName,Rating, cast(SUBSTR(ReleaseDate,7,4) as integer) ReleaseYear,ReleaseDate ,MovieTitle,M.MovieID From Movies M JOIN MovieActors AM ON M.MovieID = AM.MovieID JOIN Actors A ON A.ActorID = AM.ActorID")

%%pyspark
# Write all data back tot he serve layer in Parquet format
dfresult.write.format("parquet").mode("overwrite").save('abfss://rawteam4@adls2team4.dfs.core.windows.net/fourthcoffee/combined')

%%sql 
select 'all' as filename, count(*) as rows 
from fdic_ris.cdi
union all
select filename, count(*) as rows
from fdic_ris.cdi
group by filename

# Read in movies csv from fourth coffee
data_path = spark.read.load('abfss://rawteam4@adls2team4.dfs.core.windows.net/fourthcoffee/Movies.csv', format='csv', header=True)

fourth_coffee_df = data_path.toPandas()
fourth_coffee_df['DataSource'] = 'Fourth Coffee'
fourth_coffee_df.head()

# Read in movies csv from van arsdel
data_path = spark.read.load('abfss://rawteam4@adls2team4.dfs.core.windows.net/vanarsdel/dboMovies.txt', format='text', header=True)

van_arsdel_df = data_path.toPandas()
van_arsdel_df['DataSource'] = 'Van Arsdel'
van_arsdel_df.head()

# Read in movies csv from van arsdel
data_path = spark.read.load('abfss://rawteam4@adls2team4.dfs.core.windows.net/vanarsdel/dboActors.txt', format='text', header=True)

van_arsdel_df = data_path.toPandas()
van_arsdel_df['DataSource'] = 'Van Arsdel1'
van_arsdel_df.head()

# Read in movies csv from van arsdel
data_path = spark.read.load('abfss://rawteam4@adls2team4.dfs.core.windows.net/southridge/movies/data_3f52b042-9b0f-4ac6-80fb-33bee16fe616_250100c9-965a-4ac2-8941-d45f5b33073f.json', format='json')

cosmos_df = data_path.toPandas()
cosmos_df['DataSource'] = 'Southridge'
cosmos_df.head()

movies_df1 = fourth_coffee_df.append(van_arsdel_df, sort=False)
movies_df = movies_df1.append(cosmos_df, sort=False)
movies_df['Category'] = movies_df['Category'].fillna(movies_df['genre'])
movies_df['Rating'] = movies_df['Rating'].fillna(movies_df['rating'])
movies_df['RunTimeMin'] = movies_df['RunTimeMin'].fillna(movies_df['runtime'])
movies_df['MovieTitle'] = movies_df['MovieTitle'].fillna(movies_df['title'])
movies_df['MovieID'] = movies_df['MovieID'].fillna(movies_df['id'])
movies_df['Rating'] = movies_df['Rating'].replace('PG=13','PG-13')
movies_df.head()

movies_df_dedupe_sk = pd.merge(movies_df_dedupe, categories_df_dedupe, on='Category', how='left')
movies_df_dedupe_sk = movies_df_dedupe_sk.drop('Category', axis=1)
movies_df_dedupe_sk = movies_df_dedupe_sk.rename(columns={'index_y':'MovieCategorySK'})
movies_df_dedupe_sk.head()

movies_df_dedupe_sk = pd.merge(movies_df_dedupe_sk, ratings_df_dedupe, on='Rating', how='left')
movies_df_dedupe_sk = movies_df_dedupe_sk.drop('Rating', axis=1)
movies_df_dedupe_sk = movies_df_dedupe_sk.rename(columns={'index':'MovieRatingSK'})
movies_df_dedupe_sk = movies_df_dedupe_sk.rename(columns={'index_x':'MovieSK'})
movies_df_dedupe_sk.head()

movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieSK'] = movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieSK'].astype(int)
movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieID'] = movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieID'].astype(str)
movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieTitle'] = movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieTitle'].astype(str)
movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieCategorySK'] = movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieCategorySK'].astype(int)
movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieRatingSK'] = movies_df_dedupe_sk['MovieRatingSK'].astype(int)
movies_df_dedupe_sk['RunTimeMin'] = movies_df_dedupe_sk['RunTimeMin'].astype(float)
